Welcome to DICOM2FEM's documentation!
=====================================


Overview
--------

**DICOM2FEM** is an application for semi-automatic generation of
finite element meshes from CT/MR scans stored in the DICOM file format.

The software **DICOM2FEM** is written in the Python language and is
based on PyQT and VTK libraries.

License: `BSD <http://opensource.org/licenses/bsd-license.php>`_

Links
-----

  * - Source code - git repository
    - https://github.com/vlukes/dicom2fem
  * - Bug/issue tracking
    - https://github.com/vlukes/dicom2fem/issues
